caption.title: Total alkaloids content (mg CE/g dry weight).
caption.p: In the figure different lower case letters (a, b, c, d, e, x, y, z, w, v) in the bars indicates significant differences among means (PË‚0.05). The blue and red colour bars indicate the aqueous and 70% ethanolic extracts, respectively. X-axis denotes the plant name and Y-axis denotes the concentrations of total alkaloids contents (mg Caffeine Equivalent/g Dry Weight).
